snippet.title: Last Hope - Tower Defense - Trailer
snippet.description: Zombie Tower Defense: Join the ongoing war, in an open world, against the zombie horde, scavenging raiders and other threats roaming the wasteland! Choose between multiple powerful heroes all with unique epic gear and skills! With the wide variety of towers you can create your own perfect strategy. Enjoy a visually stunning  tower defense game in full 3D!
